fact_list.fact_text: Websites for driving in Singapore and general road safety include Singapore Police Force, Singapore Road Safety Council, Electronics Driver Data Information & Enquiry System (EDDIES), and One.Motoring.
The Singapore Police Force website is http://www.police.gov.sg/resources/traffic-matters.
The Singapore Road Safety Council website is http://srsc.org.sg/.
The Electronics Driver Data Information & Enquiry System (EDDIES) website is http://www.police.gov.sg/e-services.
For driving overseas and International Driving Permit applications, refer to the Automobile Association of Singapore (AAS) website http://www.aas.com.sg/index.php.
